description: Triggers the workflow when another workflow has an error

properties.displayName: This node will trigger when there is an error in another workflow, as long as that workflow is set up to do so. <a href="https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.errortrigger" target="_blank">More info<a>
properties.name: notice

name: n8n-nodes-base.errorTrigger
